thread.title: Model Ashley Graham puts on seriously busty display at Milan Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Model Ashley Graham puts on seriously busty display at Milan Fashion Week

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Model Ashley Graham puts on seriously busty display at Milan Fashion Week
text:
Model Ashley Graham puts on seriously busty display at Milan Fashion Week The ANTM judge put the rest of the modeling word to shame in her cleavage-baring gown Share Ashley looked fierce (Photo: Rex) Share     
Ashley Graham is not afraid to show off her gorgeous curves. 
In an industry that glorifies smaller body types, the ANTM judge has managed to beat the odds and become one of the most popular supermodels in the world. 
Ashley was spotted attending Maxmara Women's runway show at Milan Fashion Week on Thursday, where she made sure to have all eyes on her in an eye-popping outfit. 
She looked stunning in a figure-hugging white dress that showed off her toned legs and gorgeous hourglass physique. (Photo: Rex Features) She was flawless from head-to-toe (Photo: Rex Features) All eyes were on her bust (Photo: Rex Features) 
But all eyes were on the brunette beauty's cleavage, thanks to the stylish gown's super low-cut front. 
Ashley hit headlines last week when she slammed criticism aimed at her first ever US Vogue magazine cover, with some sceptics making accusations of photoshopping and more . 
The star's pose in the snap sees her as the only model with her hand resting on her leg, with one critic writing: "Find this quite galling. Why is Ashley Graham the only one covering her thigh? (Photo: Inez and Vinoodh/Vogue) 
Many accuse the publication of editing the image to make Ashley – who is a size 16 – appear slimmer - with some fans pointing out that Gigi’s hand and arm looks “too long” as if it had been edited to cover up Ashley. 
Another noted it could have been Ashley's own arm around herself, while she cleared up the pose in a comment on Instagram. 
"I chose to pose like that," she clarified. "No one told me to do anything." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
